channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.description: Explore the process of transforming a PPG Trike Power Glider into an amphibious vehicle. Learn how to integrate water propulsion and flotation for a truly versatile travel experience across land, air, and water! üåü

item.title: Engineering Statistics: An Essential Tool for Engineers üíª
item.description: Engineering statistics is the application of statistical methods to engineering problems. It is a powerful tool that can be used to solve a wide variety of problems in engineering, including quality control, design of experiments, reliability engineering, risk analysis, and data mining.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: DIY Summer Dinghy Project: Build Your Own Floating Deck! üåû
item.description: Dive into our comprehensive guide to building your own summer dinghy. From flotation and decking to the engine, learn how to create a fun and functional floating deck for your summer adventures. üö§
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: The Mechanics of Flight: How Do Drones Fly?
item.description: Drones, also known as unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), have become increasingly popular for various applications. In this blog post, we explore the principles and technology behind how drones fly and the components that make it possible.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: The Uphill Battle: How Trains Conquer Steep Inclines
item.description: Have you ever wondered how trains manage to climb steep hills without slipping or stalling? In this blog post, we explore the fascinating engineering principles and techniques that allow trains to conquer even the most challenging uphill battles.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Calculus 2: Advanced Concepts and Applications üíª
item.description: Calculus 2 covers advanced topics in differentiation and integration, including Taylor series, sequences and series, and multivariable calculus.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: The Modular Machine Age: A Marketplace for Hardware Invention
item.description: Imagine a platform where anyone‚Äîfrom college kids to seasoned engineers‚Äîcan invent hardware, license microcomponents, run simulations, and monetize every bolt, pipe, and chip. This is the dawn of the open hardware economy.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
